content: remaining from heel flap end of round 4 sts decreased gusset decreasing round b k repeat decreasing rounds a and b using mc pick up and knit 16 sts along abbreviations seven more times 32 sts remain the left side of the heel flap pm or note k knit this as left side point lsp in some k to lsp then distribute sts evenly p purl manner between 2 needles 16 sts on each lsp pm place marker and rsp being at the ends make 1 st at the start of the instep k2tog knit 2 together section then work across the 32 instep p2tog purl 2 together break yarn with 18 tail and thread onto stitches in established pattern the ssk slip 2 sts knitwise move a darning needle dn hold the two newly made stitch will be purled in both to left needle and needles parallel in the left hand begin at future row so that the instep section k2tog through back of loop the right-most stitches 33sts begins and ends with a purl sl1 slip_stitch 1 insert dn into 1st st on front needle co cast on pm or note this as right side point rsp purlwise and pull yarn through leaving rs right side in some manner st on needle ws wrong side st s stitch es pick up and knit 16 sts along the right 2 insert dn into 1st st on rear needle lsp left side point side of the heel flap then knit 9 sts from knitwise and pull yarn through leaving rsp right side point heel st on needle bor beginning of round the beginning-of-round now occurs at dn darning needle 3 insert dn into 1st st on front needle this point in the middle of the bottom knitwise letting st fall off needle then of the heel pm or note this as beginning of round insert dn into next st on front needle purlwise leaving bor in some manner st on needle pull yarn through decreasing round 1 k to 3 sts before lsp k2tog k1 4 insert dn into 1st st on rear needle purlwise letting st work 33sts in established pattern k1 ssk k to end of fall off needle then insert dn into next st on rear round 2 sts decreased needle knitwise leaving st on needle pull yarn through decreasing round 2 k to lsp work 33sts in established repeat steps 3 and 4 until all sts are grafted together pattern k to end of round weave in all ends repeat decreasing rounds 1 and 2 eight more times 65sts remain © 2019 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
